lead_paragraph: HYAMS--Ira L. It is with great sadness that we mourn the passing of Ira L. Hyams, 85, of Somers, NY, beloved husband of Miriam, adored father of Paul, Ron and Jennifer Prizer, son-in- law, Scott Prizer and daughters-in-law Lisa Kwong and Carole Hyams, cherished grandfather of seven grandchildren. Devoted brother of Norman Hyams and sister Joan Geismar. A graduate of Cornell University and Columbia Law School, an intelligent, kind, gentle man who loved his family, the practice of law, outdoor sports and the Adirondacks. He will be sorely missed by the many who enjoyed his company and wonderful sense of humor. Funeral service Friday, June 24th, 1:30pm, Temple Beth El, 220 South Bedford Road, Chappaqua, NY. Donations may be made to the Alzheimer's Association. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HYAMS, IRA L
